single_sign_on_service_redirect_url.title: SSO REDIRECT URL
single_sign_on_service_redirect_url.description: URL target of the IdP where the Authentication REDIRECT Request Message will be sent.

single_sign_on_service_redirect_binding.title: SSO REDIRECT binding
single_sign_on_service_redirect_binding.description: SAML protocol binding to be used when returning the REDIRECT <Response> message.

single_sign_on_service_post_url.title: SSO POST response URL
single_sign_on_service_post_url.description: URL target of the IdP where the Authentication POST Request Message will be sent.

single_sign_on_service_post_binding.title: SSO POST binding
single_sign_on_service_post_binding.description: SAML protocol binding to be used when returning the POST <Response> message.

single_logout_service_url.title: SP Logout URL
single_logout_service_url.description: URL Location where the <LogoutRequest> from the IdP will be sent (IdP-initiated logout).

single_logout_service_redirect_response_.title: SSO logout REDIRECT response URL
single_logout_service_redirect_response_.description: URL Location where the REDIRECT <LogoutResponse> from the IdP will sent (SP-initiated logout, reply): only specify if different from url parameter.

single_logout_service_redirect_binding.title: SSO logout REDIRECT binding
single_logout_service_redirect_binding.description: SAML protocol binding to be used when returning the REDIRECT <Response> message.

single_logout_service_post_response_url.title: SSO logout POST response URL
single_logout_service_post_response_url.description: URL Location where the POST <LogoutResponse> from the IdP will sent (SP-initiated logout, reply): only specify if different from url parameter.

single_logout_service_post_binding.title: SSO logout POST binding
single_logout_service_post_binding.description: SAML protocol binding to be used when returning the POST <Response> message.

x509certs.title: Public IdP certificates
x509certs.description: Comma separated list of public X.509 certificates of the IdP.
